dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, uh, big news coming out of Kazakhstan today, affecting, like, air travel quite a bit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, uh, big news coming out of Kazakhstan today, affecting, like, air travel quite a bit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah? What's going on now? [interrupts] Is it more...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah? What's going on now? Is it more...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the Aviation Administration there has just, um, imposed a complete ban on flights over several Middle Eastern countries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the Aviation Administration there has just, um, imposed a complete ban on flights over several Middle Eastern countries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to the outbreak of hostilities in the Middle East and the high level of threat to civil aviation safety, the Aviation Administration of Kazakhstan has imposed a complete ban on flights over several countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A complete ban? Wow. Which countries are we talking about, specifically?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A complete ban? Wow. Which countries are we talking about, specifically?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's pretty extensive. We're looking at Iran, Israel, Syria, Iraq, Jordan, and Lebanon. So, like, a big chunk of the region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's pretty extensive. We're looking at Iran, Israel, Syria, Iraq, Jordan, and Lebanon. So, like, a big chunk of the region.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Flights are prohibited within and near the airspace of Iran, Israel, Syria, Iraq, Jordan, and Lebanon until further notice.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right. And this is for all Kazakhstani aircraft, right? Passenger, cargo, everything?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right. And this is for all Kazakhstani aircraft, right? Passenger, cargo, everything?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. All scheduled and non-scheduled passenger, cargo, and technical flights by Kazakhstani operators. And, uh, it's until further notice.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. All scheduled and non-scheduled passenger, cargo, and technical flights by Kazakhstani operators. And, uh, it's until further notice.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This directive applies to all scheduled and non-scheduled passenger, cargo, and technical flights by Kazakhstani aircraft operators. ... until further notice.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Man, that really underscores, doesn't it, the seriousness of the situation over there? Like, the escalating conflict.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Man, that really underscores, doesn't it, the seriousness of the situation over there? Like, the escalating conflict.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Absolutely. And it's not just them, actually. We've seen reports, um, Flydubai, for instance...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And it's not just them, actually. We've seen reports, um, Flydubai, for instance...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I saw something about that! They've canceled, like, dozens of flights, haven't they? From places like Kazakhstan, Russia, Armenia...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I saw something about that! They've canceled, like, dozens of flights, haven't they? From places like Kazakhstan, Russia, Armenia...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, several media outlets reported that Flydubai had canceled dozens of flights departing from Kazakhstan, Russia, Belarus, Tatarstan, Armenia, and Azerbaijan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! Belarus, Tatarstan, Azerbaijan too. All linked directly to the, uh, you know, the escalating conflict between Israel and Iran.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! Belarus, Tatarstan, Azerbaijan too. All linked directly to the, uh, you know, the escalating conflict between Israel and Iran.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Flydubai had canceled dozens of flights departing from Kazakhstan, Russia, Belarus, Tatarstan, Armenia, and Azerbaijan. This decision is linked to the escalating conflict between Israel and Iran.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, basically, anyone flying out of those regions, heading towards or over that area, is just, like, out of luck for now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, basically, anyone flying out of those regions, heading towards or over that area, is just, like, out of luck for now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. It's all about, uh, civil aviation safety, which, honestly, makes total sense given the high threat level.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. It's all about, uh, civil aviation safety, which, honestly, makes total sense given the high threat level.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to the outbreak of hostilities in the Middle East and the high level of threat to civil aviation safety, the Aviation Administration of Kazakhstan has imposed a complete ban on flights over several countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, you can't really argue with that. It's a huge safety concern.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, you can't really argue with that. It's a huge safety concern.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the directive came into effect immediately, so it's mandatory. They said they'll provide updates if the situation, you know, changes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the directive came into effect immediately, so it's mandatory. They said they'll provide updates if the situation, you know, changes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The directive comes into effect upon receipt and is subject to mandatory compliance, the press service of the Civil Aviation Committee reported. If the situation in the region changes, additional information will be provided by the aviation security department of the Aviation Administration of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, here's hoping it does, uh, change for the better soon.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, here's hoping it does, uh, change for the better soon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Agreed. We'll definitely be keeping an eye on it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Agreed. We'll definitely be keeping an eye on it.
